Mini Athletic Trainer Bag

Weighing in at less than 5 lbs, this mini bag is very easy to carry on your side or over your shoulder. Its compact and lightweight design makes it great for quick cases, as a small medical bag kit, or as an emergency bag.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Embroidery options for up to 3 sides of the bag
  • Foam padding on all sides
  • Durable lightweight plastic throughout side walls for rigidity and protection
  • Padded shoulder strap
  • Padded carrying handle
  • Professional grade materials
  • 5 outer pockets
  • 6 interior pockets
  • 2 interior mesh pockets
  • 2 removable and adjustable dividers in the interior

  • Learn more about bag features

Mini Athletic Trainer Bag$xxx

  • Bag Weight: 4.6 lbs
  • External Dimensions: 10" Tall x 8.5" Wide x 21" Long
  • Internal Dimensions: 9" Tall x 7.5" Wide x 14.5" Long
